author: Alberto Nardelli
title: Matt Hancock’s New Coronavirus Tracing App Won’t Work Without A Huge Increase In Testing And People To Do Contact Tracing
description: “You cannot ‘big data’ your way out of a ‘no data’ situation. Period.” View Entire Post ›
content:
A widely-publicised NHS contact tracing app announced by health secretary Matt Hancock will prove ineffective if it relies on technology alone, according to leading experts from other countries running similar schemes.
Hancock confirmed plans on Sunday for a… [+10424 chars]
